statements: SELECT * FROM payment_information;
SELECT id, card_number FROM payment_information WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_information WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE id = 5;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_information WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, card_number FROM payment_information;
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, card_number, cvv FROM payment_information WHERE card_number LIKE '****1234%';
SELECT * FROM payment_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, card_number ASC;
SELECT id, card_number FROM payment_information WHERE SUBSTRING(card_number, 5, 4) = '5678';
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM payments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_card_details FROM payments WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT amount, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE id = 100;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payments WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_amount, encrypted_card_holder_name FROM payments;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_date, status FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, status FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.payment_amount FROM transactions t JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM payments LIMIT 10;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_status FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'approved';
SELECT card_id, user_id FROM cards WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'successful';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT p.payment_id, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_status FROM payments p INNER JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE t.transaction_status = 'pending';
SELECT c.card_id, u.username, c.encrypted_card_number FROM users u INNER JOIN cards c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.username = 'Alice' AND c.encrypted_card_number LIKE '%1234';

SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, p.amount FROM transactions t INNER JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id WHERE p.amount > 5000 ORDER BY p.amount DESC, t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards;
SELECT card_holder, card_number FROM payment_cards WHERE expiry_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT address_id, city FROM addresses WHERE postal_code = '10001';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder = 'Alice';
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_cards WHERE cvv = 123;

SELECT users.name, addresses.city, transactions.amount FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id JOIN transactions ON transactions.card_id = (SELECT card_id FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder = 'Alice');
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.name, a.street_address, t.amount FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN transactions t ON t.card_id IN (SELECT card_id FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder = 'Bob');
